sentences.chinese: 然而，我們必須小心謹慎。

sentences.english: I take care of my new T-shirt as a matter of course.
sentences.chinese: 我很小心我的新T恤，這是很自然的事。

sentences.english: He reminded me how careful I ought to be in doing it.
sentences.chinese: 他提醒我在做這事的時候應如何小心。

sentences.english: When he says "take care" the words are inflected with humanity.
sentences.chinese: 當他說‘一路小心’，言語間充滿了人性。

sentences.english: Do not wave on a boat, or you will fall into the water.
sentences.chinese: 行舟過渡時不要亂動，小心落水。

sentences.english: They should always be examined carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你應該經常小心地做好檢查。
小心圖表建造者創造的幻覺。

sentences.english: The colors arent fast, so be careful when you wash this shirt.
sentences.chinese: 這些顏色易褪色，所以洗襯衫時要小心。

sentences.english: On my first time I accidentally crashed into a snow boarder.
sentences.chinese: 第一次滑下來的時候我不小心撞上玩雪地滑板的人。

sentences.english: Yet evidence abounds that banks are still gun-shy about lending to business.
sentences.chinese: 但是諸多證據顯示銀行對企業貸款仍是小心翼翼。

sentences.english: He throws the letter into the postbox carefully.
sentences.chinese: 他把信小心的投入了郵箱。

sentences.english: Care must be taken to completely seal entrance plugs(eg. at a manway)in refractory linings.
sentences.chinese: 必須小心地完全封閉耐火材料襯裏的進口門。

sentences.english: He carelessly bestrews the ground with biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 他不小心把餅乾撒落了一地。

sentences.english: Beware of those who fish in troubled waters.
sentences.chinese: 小心那些混水摸魚的人。

sentences.english: Take care to avoid to put your fingers on polished surface.
sentences.chinese: 小心避免安裝時別將手指碰到閥內磨光面上。

sentences.english: Do you feel it out to see what the situation is?
sentences.chinese: 你會小心試探一下，看看是什麼狀況嗎？
